page.title: 05Richmond.Spare time
page.content:
In my dads spare time he either watches television if there is anything on or he goes across to Hollycroft Park and plays golf or tennis or he goes swimming and jumps off all the diving boards or he plays in the garden with me, Richard and Hazel in our garden I swing and then he goes and has his tea.Then we watch the television.
In my mums spare time she either watches television if there is anything on, or goes outside and plays chinese elastic. Then we go up to the town and we have some fish and chips at Topper's fish bar,or we go into a restaurant,then we go home.
